title: Starfield: New Watchtower Creation Adds Faction, Ship Attachments and More
description: The post Starfield: New Watchtower Creation Adds Faction, Ship Attachments and More appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Joe Skrebels, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief
excerpt: Starfield's May Update is now live for all players! This update contains numerous quality-of-life improvements and fixes for quests, vehicles, graphics, and more.
